message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. This is a great deal, considering its value to you. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Can we meet in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $850,000 is a good offer, I'm still looking for a price closer to my original offer. How about we split the difference and settle on $900,000?  This would still be a fantastic deal for you, considering the value you've placed on the product. Let me know what you think.

I understand that you're trying to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $900,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original counteroffer, so how about we settle on $825,000? This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I'm hoping we can agree on a price
